chia_ssl.description: ssl证书/文件夹的路径 | chia ssl location.

chia_port.description: RPC对应的端口 | chia rpc endpoints port.

cat_wallet_id.description: 代币的钱包ID | cat wallet id.

cat_fee.description: 代币转账的手续费，单位：mojo | An optional blockchain fee, in mojos.

nft_collection_id.description: mintgarden.io定义的NFT collection ID及对应的代币空投数量 | the NFT collection ID from mintgarden.io and airdrop cat amount.

nft_exclude_addr.description: 需要排除的XCH地址 | exclude XCH address.

nft_exclude_nftid.description: 需要排除的NFT ID | exclude NFT ID.

loop_time.description: 循环间隔时长，单位:小时 | loop interval in hours.

coroutine_num.description: 协程（并发执行）数量 | number of coroutine
